${modID}:RallyStrength.NAME: Rally Strength
${modID}:RallyStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain temp. Strength. NL Gain temp. Focus. NL Gain temp. Dexterity.

${modID}:RallyMagic.NAME: Rally Magic
${modID}:RallyMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain temp. Focus. NL Gain temp. Dexterity. NL Gain temp. Strength.

${modID}:RallyDefense.NAME: Rally Defense
${modID}:RallyDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain temp. Dexterity. NL Gain temp. Strength. NL Gain temp. Focus.

${modID}:UpgradeAttacks.NAME: Upgrade Attacks
${modID}:UpgradeAttacks.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your hand's Attacks for the rest of combat.

${modID}:UpgradeSkills.NAME: Upgrade Skills
${modID}:UpgradeSkills.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your hand's Skills for the rest of combat.

${modID}:UpgradePowers.NAME: Upgrade Powers
${modID}:UpgradePowers.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your hand's Powers for the rest of combat.

${modID}:Veteran.NAME: Veteran
${modID}:Veteran.DESCRIPTION: This card is a copy of the Common ${modID}:Combat_Art of your equipped weapon.
${modID}:Veteran.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This card is a copy of the upgraded Common ${modID}:Combat_Art of your equipped weapon.

${modID}:Solidarity.NAME: Solidarity
${modID}:Solidarity.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect. NL Channel 1 Lightning.

${modID}:Vulnerary.NAME: Vulnerary
${modID}:Vulnerary.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL {@@}Add Retain on !${modID}:retainCards! card{!${modID}:retainCards!|1=|@=s} NL for the rest of combat. NL End your turn. Exhaust.

${modID}:DebugWeapon.NAME: Debug Weapon
${modID}:DebugWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain [E] [E]. NL Apply any weapon type onto an enemy.

${modID}:WrathStrike.NAME: Wrath Strike
${modID}:WrathStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Sword. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage, NL increased by your ${modID}:Deflect. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect.

${modID}:TempestLance.NAME: Tempest Lance
${modID}:TempestLance.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Lance. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Consume 3 ${modID}:Deflect NL to Channel 1 Frost.

${modID}:Smash.NAME: Smash
${modID}:Smash.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Axe. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! temp. Strength.

${modID}:CurvedShot.NAME: Curved Shot
${modID}:CurvedShot.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bow. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Convert your ${modID}:Deflect NL into Block and Vigor.

${modID}:Elwind.NAME: Elwind
${modID}:Elwind.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Wind. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s} next turn.

${modID}:Arcfire.NAME: Arcfire
${modID}:Arcfire.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Fire. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! temp. Focus.

${modID}:Thunder.NAME: Thunder
${modID}:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Thunder. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Flux.NAME: Flux
${modID}:Flux.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Dark. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Shove.NAME: Shove
${modID}:Shove.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Copy_Weapon. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. This turn, you can't lose Strength, Dexterity, or Focus.

${modID}:Reposition.NAME: Reposition
${modID}:Reposition.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Copy_Weapon. NL Gain !B! Block, increased by your Strength, Focus, NL and ${modID}:Deflect.
${modID}:Reposition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Copy_Weapon. NL Gain !B! Block, increased by your Strength, Focus, ${modID}:Deflect, and Energy.

${modID}:Discipline.NAME: Discipline
${modID}:Discipline.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Select a weapon type to equip now and at the end of your turn.

${modID}:Zeal.NAME: Zeal
${modID}:Zeal.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL This turn, you NL are weapon-strong. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:AlertStance.NAME: Alert Stance
${modID}:AlertStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain your hand NL this turn. NL End your turn.

${modID}:Tantivy.NAME: Tantivy
${modID}:Tantivy.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !${modID}:magicTempDex! temp. Dexterity.

${modID}:Blossom.NAME: Blossom
${modID}:Blossom.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Artifact.

${modID}:Armsthrift.NAME: Armsthrift
${modID}:Armsthrift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect. NL Choose to upgrade your hand's Attacks, Skills, or Powers for the rest of combat.

${modID}:OutdoorFighter.NAME: Outdoor Fighter
${modID}:OutdoorFighter.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !${modID}:magicDraw! card{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL For each drawn card, gain !B! Block if it was a Skill or Power, or !M! ${modID}:Deflect otherwise.
${modID}:OutdoorFighter.FLAVOR: If your hand is full, gain both bonuses for each failed draw.

${modID}:IndoorFighter.NAME: Indoor Fighter
${modID}:IndoorFighter.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL If it's a Skill or Power, gain !B! Block. Otherwise, gain NL !M! ${modID}:Deflect.

${modID}:Sunder.NAME: Sunder
${modID}:Sunder.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Sword. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage twice. {@@} NL Put up to !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s} from your draw pile into your discard pile.
${modID}:Sunder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Sword. ${modID}:Combat_Art. Strike. NL Deal !D! damage twice. {@@} NL Put up to !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s} from your draw pile into your discard pile.

${modID}:LanceJab.NAME: Lance Jab
${modID}:LanceJab.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Lance. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Gain !B! Block, increased by your ${modID}:Deflect and Strength. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

${modID}:WildAbandon.NAME: Wild Abandon
${modID}:WildAbandon.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Axe. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust a card.

${modID}:WaningShot.NAME: Waning Shot
${modID}:WaningShot.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Bow. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Consume 3 ${modID}:Deflect to apply -1 Strength.

${modID}:CuttingGale.NAME: Cutting Gale
${modID}:CuttingGale.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Wind. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhume a random non-Status/Curse card. NL Exhaust a card.
${modID}:CuttingGale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Wind. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhume a random non-Status/Curse card. NL Exhaust up to 1 card.

${modID}:DyingBlaze.NAME: Dying Blaze
${modID}:DyingBlaze.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Fire. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Exhaust !M! copies. NL Deal !D! damage, increased by the size of your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bolting.NAME: Bolting
${modID}:Bolting.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Your Lightning Orbs target ALL enemies. Exhaust.

${modID}:Nosferatu.NAME: Nosferatu
${modID}:Nosferatu.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Dark. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LevinSword.NAME: Levin Sword
${modID}:LevinSword.DESCRIPTION: Select one of NL ${modID}:Sword or ${modID}:Thunder. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Channel 1 Lightning.
${modID}:LevinSword.FLAVOR: On Exhaust, add a Sunder and Bolting to your hand.

${modID}:FlameLance.NAME: Flame Lance
${modID}:FlameLance.DESCRIPTION: Select one of NL ${modID}:Lance or ${modID}:Fire. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your Orbs.
${modID}:FlameLance.FLAVOR: On Exhaust, add a Lance Jab and Dying Blaze to your hand.

${modID}:HurricaneAxe.NAME: Hurricane Axe
${modID}:HurricaneAxe.DESCRIPTION: Select one of NL ${modID}:Axe or ${modID}:Wind. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Discard your hand.
${modID}:HurricaneAxe.FLAVOR: On Exhaust, add Wild Abandon and Cutting Gale to your hand.

${modID}:BeguilingBow.NAME: Beguiling Bow
${modID}:BeguilingBow.DESCRIPTION: Select one of NL ${modID}:Bow or ${modID}:Dark. NL Deal !D! damage. NL {@@}Add !M! Clumsy card{!M!|1=|@=s} NL to your hand.
${modID}:BeguilingBow.FLAVOR: On Exhaust, add a Waning Shot and Nosferatu to your hand.

${modID}:FlashSparrow.NAME: Flash Sparrow
${modID}:FlashSparrow.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Copy_Weapon. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you are weapon-strong, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

${modID}:Hex.NAME: Hex
${modID}:Hex.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Copy_Weapon. NL Gain !B! Block. NL On Exhaust, add a copy of this card to your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:Pavise.NAME: Pavise
${modID}:Pavise.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Arm. NL If not ${modID}:Favored, equip one of ${modID}:Sword, ${modID}:Lance, NL ${modID}:Axe, or ${modID}:Bow. NL Gain !B! Block twice.

${modID}:Aegis.NAME: Aegis
${modID}:Aegis.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Tome. NL If not ${modID}:Favored, equip one of ${modID}:Wind, ${modID}:Fire, ${modID}:Thunder, or ${modID}:Dark. NL Gain !B! Block twice.

${modID}:Charm.NAME: Charm
${modID}:Charm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL On Exhaust, gain [E] and add a copy to your draw pile.

${modID}:Miracle.NAME: Miracle
${modID}:Miracle.DESCRIPTION: Select up to !M! cards in your hand to Exhaust. NL Gain !B! Block for each Exhausted card.

${modID}:EvenOddRhythm.NAME: Even/Odd Rhythm
${modID}:EvenOddRhythm.DESCRIPTION: If the turn count is even, gain !B! Block and 1 Blur. NL If the turn count is odd, gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect.

${modID}:Pass.NAME: Pass
${modID}:Pass.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw cards equal to NL the amount discarded.

${modID}:Underdog.NAME: Underdog
${modID}:Underdog.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL If played in an Elite NL or Boss combat, increase this card's draw by 1. Exhaust.

${modID}:Gamble.NAME: Gamble
${modID}:Gamble.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL On Exhaust, add a random ${modID}:Combat_Art to your hand; NL it costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:RallySpectrum.NAME: Rally Spectrum
${modID}:RallySpectrum.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temp. Strength, Focus, and Dexterity. Choose the order they are gained.

${modID}:SecondSeal.NAME: Second Seal
${modID}:SecondSeal.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL !M! temp. Strength, NL !M! temp. Focus, or NL !M! temp. Dexterity.
${modID}:SecondSeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Choose one: NL !M! temp. Strength, NL !M! temp. Focus, or NL !M! temp. Dexterity.

${modID}:Renewal.NAME: Renewal
${modID}:Renewal.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL of your NL debuffs by X. NL On Exhaust, NL gain 1 Frail.
${modID}:Renewal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL of your NL debuffs by X+1. NL On Exhaust, NL gain 1 Frail.

${modID}:CantoControl.NAME: Canto Control
${modID}:CantoControl.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain X+1 [E]. NL On Exhaust, NL gain 1 Weak.
${modID}:CantoControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain X+1 [E]. NL {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL On Exhaust, NL gain 1 Weak.

${modID}:Prescience.NAME: Prescience
${modID}:Prescience.DESCRIPTION: If the first card NL you play in a turn NL is an Attack, NL Channel !M! Lightning.
${modID}:Prescience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. If the first NL card you play in a NL turn is an Attack, NL Channel !M! Lightning.

${modID}:Patience.NAME: Patience
${modID}:Patience.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect.

${modID}:Acrobat.NAME: Acrobat
${modID}:Acrobat.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose ${modID}:Deflect from an enemy attack, lose !M! less. ${modID}:Deflect damages NL ALL enemies.

${modID}:CreationPulse.NAME: Creation Pulse
${modID}:CreationPulse.DESCRIPTION: If you gain Stat Down, NL apply to ALL enemies: NL Strength: !M! Vulnerable. NL Dexterity: !M! Weak. NL Focus: !M! Lock-On.

${modID}:MastersTactics.NAME: Master's Tactics
${modID}:MastersTactics.DESCRIPTION: Increase your hand size by !M! for the rest of combat. NL {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${modID}:GrimasTruth.NAME: Grima's Truth
${modID}:GrimasTruth.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Add an Expiration to your hand. Gain [E] if you Exhaust a Curse.
${modID}:GrimasTruth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Add an upgraded Expiration to your hand. Gain [E] if you Exhaust a Curse.

${modID}:StrengthUp.NAME: Strength Up
${modID}:StrengthUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:FocusUp.NAME: Magic Up
${modID}:FocusUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:DexterityUp.NAME: Defense Up
${modID}:DexterityUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:FrozenLance.NAME: Frozen Lance
${modID}:FrozenLance.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Lance. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Dexterity affects NL this card !M! times.

${modID}:ExhaustiveStrike.NAME: Exhaustive Strike
${modID}:ExhaustiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Axe. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust cards in your hand freely. On Exhaust, gain !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:HuntersVolley.NAME: Hunter's Volley
${modID}:HuntersVolley.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Bow. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL If Fatal, gain [E] and draw a card.

${modID}:Excalibur.NAME: Excalibur
${modID}:Excalibur.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Wind. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 extra card.
${modID}:Excalibur.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Wind. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 extra card. {@@}NL Next turn, draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${modID}:Bolganone.NAME: Bolganone
${modID}:Bolganone.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Fire. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Double your ${modID}:Deflect.
${modID}:Bolganone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Fire. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Triple your ${modID}:Deflect.

${modID}:Thoron.NAME: Thoron
${modID}:Thoron.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Thunder. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL ALL enemies lose NL !D! HP and Block. NL Channel 1 Lightning.
${modID}:Thoron.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Thunder. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL ALL enemies lose NL !D! HP, Block, and Barricade. NL Channel 1 Lightning.

${modID}:Goetia.NAME: Goetia
${modID}:Goetia.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor ${modID}:Dark. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Luna.NAME: Luna
${modID}:Luna.DESCRIPTION: Your next ${modID}:Combat_Art NL is played twice.

${modID}:Ignis.NAME: Ignis
${modID}:Ignis.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to your current Focus. NL Gain Focus equal to your prior Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Ignis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to your current Focus. Gain Focus equal to your prior Strength. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${modID}:SealAtk4.NAME: Seal Atk 4
${modID}:SealAtk4.DESCRIPTION: Retain. The enemy NL loses !M! Strength. NL You lose 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:MasterSeal.NAME: Master Seal
${modID}:MasterSeal.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Ritual. NL Gain !M! Focus. NL Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TipTheScales.NAME: Tip the Scales!
${modID}:TipTheScales.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL On Exhaust, gain NL !M! Artifact.
${modID}:TipTheScales.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL On Exhaust, gain NL !M! Artifact.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have to Exhaust this card to gain its effect.

${modID}:PartOfThePlan.NAME: Part of the Plan
${modID}:PartOfThePlan.DESCRIPTION: Play this as your first card only. Exhaust 2 random cards. EVERYONE gets Barricade.
${modID}:PartOfThePlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2 cards. NL EVERYONE gets Barricade.

${modID}:SturdyStance.NAME: Sturdy Stance
${modID}:SturdyStance.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the end of your NL turn, Retain up to NL !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${modID}:ChaosStyle.NAME: Chaos Style
${modID}:ChaosStyle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change your weapon type, NL gain !M! Block.

${modID}:QuickBurn.NAME: Quick Burn
${modID}:QuickBurn.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain [E] and add random ${modID}:Combat_Arts to your hand for each card Exhausted.

${modID}:GrandmasterForm.NAME: Grandmaster Form
${modID}:GrandmasterForm.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Whenever you Exhaust a card, NL Channel 1 Lightning.
${modID}:GrandmasterForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Retain. NL Whenever you Exhaust a card, NL Channel 1 Lightning.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The key to victory NL lies within.
${modID}:GrandmasterForm.FLAVOR: Exhausted copies, such as NL Dying Blaze, don't trigger this.

${modID}:Expiration.NAME: Expiration
${modID}:Expiration.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Lose !M! NL HP. Deal !D! damage. NL Add an Injury to your hand.
